title: Are you even trying to fix the Unknown Error issue ?
body: 3 days now i am getting the same freaking thing..checkin' a friends profile gets errored checkin' my profile ? same shiet,Creating a normal game ? again unknown error,a bot game should work at least right ? WRONG ! again unknown error...lets try a custom game..As expected again this freaking anoying error...Sitting on the freaking main page of the client? fuckin' error without even doing something! The worst part is when you finally manage to pick a champion and you pick for example Velkoz and then you cant pick anyone else,cant choose spells,cant choose rune pages,masteries,and if that wasnt enough when the time runs out the client crashes...well at least you can login after a momment right ? nope,you have to spend about 3-4 minutes because when you press on the game icon all you get is LoL has stopped working...at least you are able to finally join the game...IF they havent remake it cause of you (Riot) And no,i am not the only on having this problem ive seen people having this annoying af problem too some of my friends too **Fix It Riot**

replies.body: It sounds like there are lot of errors occurring through different actions; though, a lot of them seem like a symptom of connection issues.  Your client might be having trouble communicating with the servers and causing it to crash.  I recommend going through our [Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as a first step to rule out any unstable connection problems.
